title.narrative: Increase capacity and resilience of poor people HUMANITARIAN RESPONSE

description.narrative: Humanitarian Response - UN, (1) active case finding and community mobilization implemented to increase timely referral and demand for life-saving nutrition services (2) increasing access to life-saving nutrition interventions particularly management of acute malnutrition amongst the most vulnerable population in drought affected provinces (3) strengthening monitoring and information management of nutrition situation and response in affected provinces.

Responding to nutrition emergency in most affected districts of three drought affected provinces (Gaza, Inhambane and Manica) with a focus on children under-five with severe & moderate acute malnutrition, Life saving and life sustaining assistance to the population affected by the droughts in 5 provinces (Tete, Sofala, Gaza, Inhambane and Maputo); food for 164,450 people building and restoring community assets, school feeding for 75,300 school children, restoration of livelihoods, resilience building activities,
